de.grau.organizer.fragments

Class WeekFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • de.grau.organizer.fragments.WeekFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class WeekFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
    A simple Fragment subclass. Activities that contain this fragment must implement the WeekFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener interface to handle interaction events. Use the newInstance(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) factory method to create an instance of this fragment.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  WeekFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener
      This interface must be implemented by activities that contain this fragment to allow an interaction in this fragment to be communicated to the activity and potentially other fragments contained in that activity.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.support.v4.app.Fragment

        android.support.v4.app.Fragment.InstantiationException, android.support.v4.app.Fragment.SavedState

      • changeCalendarWeek

        public void changeCalendarWeek(int weeks)
        This method can be used to redraw the events or increment, decrement the view
        Parameters:
        weeks - 0 to redraw, 1 to go to the next week, -1 is the week before the current set week
